resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit the application?
Username and password cannot be empty.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Would you like to extend your session?
Your session has expired for security reasons. Please login again to continue.
Are you sure you want to logout? Your session will be ended and you will need to login again.
Are you sure you want to navigate to the main menu? All unsaved changes will be lost.
Does this person have a coupon?
Participation requires a valid coupon code. Please ask for assistance.
This coupon has already been used
This coupon has not been issued yet
Error validating coupon. Please try again.
Please select the participant\'s preferred language
Por favor seleccione su idioma preferido para la encuesta
The participant will complete the survey independently. Please ensure privacy and hand the device to the participant after this screen.
Would you be willing to be contacted to participate in this survey in the future?
Your contact information will be kept confidential and used only for survey invitations.
You can provide either a phone number or email address
Please follow the instructions below to capture the participant\'s fingerprint
Failed to capture fingerprint. Please try again.

1. Collect biological samples according to protocol
2. Label each sample with the Subject ID shown above
3. Store samples as per guidelines
4. Confirm collection or indicate if subject refused
The survey has been completed successfully.
Please provide these %1$d coupons to the participant:
Each coupon can be used once for survey participation

1. Contact your system administrator for the server URL and API key
2. The server URL should point to your SALT management server
3. API key is optional but recommended for security
4. Test the connection before saving
5. All survey uploads will use these settings
Did you send the recruitment message?
Please confirm that you have sent the recruitment message to %1$s
No eligible participants found for recruitment at this time.
Participation requires a valid coupon code. Please ask for assistance.
The survey has been completed successfully.
Please provide these %1$d coupons to the participant:
Each coupon can be used once for survey participation

Provide another coupon with this code on it. Also write the text \'Your coupon\' to it. Explain to the participant that this is their ID and will be required when they come in to be paid for recruiting people. No recruitment payments will be made without this code, so tell them not to lose it.
Please follow the instructions below to capture the participant\'s fingerprint
Ensure the SecuGen device is connected and the green light is on
Ask the participant to place their right index finger on the scanner
Press gently and hold until the scan completes
The device will beep when the scan is successful
Failed to capture fingerprint. Please try again.
This participant has already been enrolled in a survey recently.
They are not eligible for re-enrollment for another %1$d days.
Please select the participant\'s preferred language
Por favor seleccione su idioma preferido para la encuesta
Upload failed - will retry in background
Error during upload - will retry in background
Please confirm that you have received the payment using your fingerprint
The app needs to restart to apply the language change. Would you like to restart now?
Please confirm that you have sent the recruitment message to %1$s
Are you sure you want to delete user \"%1$s\" (@%2$s)? This action cannot be undone.
Do you want to re-enroll the fingerprint for \"%1$s\"? This will replace the current fingerprint data.
Do you want to enroll a fingerprint for \"%1$s\"? This will allow them to login using their fingerprint.
Are you sure you want to disable biometric authentication for \"%1$s\"? They will no longer be able to login using biometric authentication.
Maximum attempts exceeded. Please restart the application.
No staff users configured. Please use username and password.
Hand the tablet to the participant along with headphones
Take the participant to a private room where they can complete the survey comfortably and confidentially
Please hand the tablet back to the participant
The participant will now continue with their survey
Let\'s get started by configuring your server connection
• For emulator: use http://10.0.2.2:3000\n• For physical device on local network: use http://192.168.x.x:3000\n• For production: use https://your-server.com
This account will have full administrative access to the SALT system
Username must be at least 3 characters
Password must be at least 3 characters
• Username must be at least 3 characters\n• Password must be at least 3 characters\n• Fingerprint enrollment will be required in the next step
Enroll your fingerprint for secure authentication
✗ Fingerprint scanner not connected. Please connect the device and try again.
✗ Please grant USB permission and try again.
✗ Failed to capture fingerprint after 3 attempts
✗ Low quality scan. Please try again (Attempt %1$d of 3)
• Place your index finger on the scanner\n• Keep your finger steady during capture\n• Fingerprint is required for account creation
URL must start with http:// or https://
Cannot connect - check URL and network
Connection timeout - server may be unreachable
Note: Only survey staff users can conduct surveys, not administrators. Create a SURVEY_STAFF user in the Manage Users area.
Enter the setup code provided by your administrator
Thank you for your participation. You will now receive your payment.
No fingerprint enrollment found for this survey
Please grant USB permission and try again
Fingerprint does not match. Please try again.
Admin Override - Continue Without Subject Fingerprint
To confirm payment without subject fingerprint verification, an administrator must authorize this action with their fingerprint.
Fingerprint does not match any administrator
✓ Admin override logged. %1$s confirmed payment given.
Enter your coupon code or scan your fingerprint to look up your recruitment payments.
Enter the coupon code to look up recruitment payment.
Scan the participant\'s fingerprint to look up their recruitment payment.
Coupon code not found. Please check and try again.
Fingerprint not found. Please try again or use your coupon code.
%1$d coupon code(s) have been used and are eligible for payment.
No coupon codes are eligible for payment at this time.
Coupon-based lookup requires administrator verification when fingerprinting is enabled. Please have an administrator scan their fingerprint.
Please read the consent agreement below:
Please sign below to indicate your consent:
No consent agreement configured. Please contact administrator.
Next we will obtain the participant\'s consent to participate in the study.
Show the tablet to the participant and let them read the terms of participation.
They will then be asked to sign and agree to continue.
Thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, you do not meet the eligibility criteria for this survey.
Please hand the tablet back to the staff member
No staff members have enrolled fingerprints
Please grant USB permission and try again
Fingerprint not recognized. Please try again.
Please grant USB permission to use the fingerprint scanner.
Please grant USB permission to use the fingerprint scanner. When prompted, tap \'OK\' to allow access to the device.
The fingerprint scanner is not connected. Please:
1. Connect the SecuGen scanner to the USB port
2. Use a USB OTG adapter if needed
3. Ensure the device is powered on
The fingerprint quality is too low. Please:
Ensure your finger is clean and dry
Place your finger flat on the scanner
Press firmly but not too hard
Make sure the scanner glass is clean
No lab tests required for this participant.
Please hand the tablet back to the staff member who gave it to you
Please record the result of the %1$s
Place right index finger on scanner
No coupons issued to this participant.
No fingerprint on file for this participant.
Please take biological samples to perform each of the following tests. Check each one to confirm that they will be performed.
Please check all tests to continue
Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter a valid email address
Select the language for the app interface. This setting applies to all users and staff members.
Note: This only affects the app interface. Survey content languages are managed separately.
%1$s can now login using their fingerprint
The user will need to use their password to login. You can enroll their fingerprint later from User Management.
You can skip fingerprint setup and use password-only authentication. Fingerprint can be enabled later in settings.
Hand the tablet to the participant. They will complete the survey by themselves and be directed to hand it back to you when completed.
Has this person participated in this survey within the last %1$d days?
If you are unsure, check with other staff members.
In a private area, the staff member will ask a few initial questions.
In a private area, hand the tablet to the participant to begin the survey.
No API Key - Use Setup Code
• Server URL can be edited to point to your server
• API Key is obtained from the facility setup code
• Use setup code to configure facility and get API key
• Test Connection verifies the server and API key
No API key - enter setup code
Invalid API key - enter new setup code
Cannot connect to server - check URL and port
Connection timeout - server may be unreachable
Place your RIGHT INDEX finger flat on the scanner
